title: richiesta aiuto per archiviazione e mail
content: Buongiorno, lavoro in uno studio legale e i miei account di posta elettronico sono su server Aruba ma lo spazio non basta e per via del mio lavoro devo archiviare tutte le mail dello studio sia in entrata che in uscita. sul pc ho trovato configurato thunderbird e mi trovo benissimo, ho archiviato tutte le migliaia di e mail (in entrata, perché in uscita non sono sincronizzate) ma non capisco che differenza ci sia tra "archivio" e "cartelle locali" ed inoltre quando provo a scaricarle, forse per via della quantità, mi si blocca il download a metà. C'è qualcuno che gentilmente potrebbe seguirmi in questi passaggi? si tratta di e mail che è meglio che non non si cancellino. Grazie mille a tutti. Michela
creator: cristina18

title: How to get automatic updates for the latest version of Thunderbird on Linux Mint 21.1 Cinnamon from 102.11.0 to 102.11.2  ?
content: I am on Linux mint 21.1 Cinnamon and using Thunderbird 102.11.0. I saw the current version of Thunderbird on their official website is 102.11.2. I didn't get the update yet. So, how can I get the update automatically to use the latest version of Thunderbird on Linux Mint 21.1 Cinnamon ? Thanks in advance and awaiting to have a good feedback.
creator: manjazahid.w25

title: How can I set a System tray Icon and show total unread email counts in the system tray icon ?
content: I am on Linux Mint 21.1 Cinnamon and I have been using Birdtray as Thunderbird system tray notification. But from 102 version Birdtray can't read incoming unread email, can't show notifications and can't shows unread counts. So, can I set a System tray Icon and show total unread email counts in the system tray icon for Thunderbird email ? Plz advise me if anyone has a solution. Thanks in advance.
creator: manjazahid.w25

title: problems witv thundebird mail
content: can't send mail/ The server responds "Excessive emails sent"
creator: bd693547

title: Thunderbird Saving IMAP password but not SMTP
content:
Thunderbird has saved the password for IMAP on my email account, but not the password for SMTP, so I have to enter the password manually each time I send an email.

Is there any way I can save the password for SMTP as I am unable to find one in Thunderbird.

Thanks
creator: markwatling

title: I can't set up  mail address
content: I have a new personal computor . I have my account in Mozzila ISP Data Base, But I can't log in to the servoir. I would like to set up the mail address in it. if possible, mail to my gmail address as followed, [removed email from public forum]

title: Thunderbird messages won't open in existing message window 102.11.2 (32-bit)
content:
Thunderbird messages won't open in existing message window 102.11.2 (32-bit). It just shows a blank screen and the message stays highlighted as not read. Double clicking will open the message in a new window and when closing the message is flagged as read. Once I double click on a message, "N" will not open next message so I have to open and close each and every message. Worked yesterday but today's update did this. (All my setting are still the same) How can I migrate back to the previous version without loosing all my accounts, settings and etc...

This is messing up my business communication! If I can get this fixed I will never update Thunderbird again!
creator: dewragdave

title: James, thanks!!
content:
Hi James,

Thanks much for your kind support. I can't seem to send you a message any other way. So, just want you to know that I appreciate your counsel. Very helpful!

Bob

title: Would like a link for 64 bit Thunderbird download, please
content:
Hello ~

I have a 64 bit Windows 7 system, and when I download Thunderbird, it gives me the 32 bit version. How can I download the 64 bit program software? Could anyone send me a link for it?

Thank you!

Bob
